## ðŸ“ Quick Start Guide

### Week 1 Checklist
1. [ ] Read course overview
2. [ ] Review prerequisites
3. [ ] Set up development environment
4. [ ] Watch Week 1 lectures
5. [ ] Complete `notes/week-01-notes.md`
6. [ ] Work through `notebooks/week-01-practice.ipynb`
7. [ ] Attempt practice problems
8. [ ] Submit Assignment 1 (if applicable)

### Daily Routine
1. **Watch** â†’ Lecture videos
2. **Note** â†’ Create/update weekly notes
3. **Code** â†’ Practice in Jupyter notebooks
4. **Apply** â†’ Solve problems
5. **Review** â†’ Check understanding
